last_episode_to_air.name: Furniture
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tyler's been dreaming of a new bed since 2013, and he finally gets his wish when he designs one fitted to match his imagination.

name: Nuts + Bolts
overview: Tyler, the Creator explores the things he loves and the ways they work, with the help of experts and personal heroes.

episodes.name: Stop Motion
episodes.overview: Tyler lives out one of his dreams to create his very own stop motion film.

episodes.name: Sneakers
episodes.overview: Tyler's passion for fashion takes him to Converse where he collaborates with their designers to create limited edition One Star shoes.

episodes.name: Breakfast
episodes.overview: Tyler, The Creator can eat waffles and syrup for every meal, and often does. He's been preparing for this day his whole life: to learn about syrup first-hand and invent a brand new breakfast item.

episodes.name: Floating
episodes.overview: Tyler's love of space drives him to explore new and different ways to float on earth by meeting with personal heroes and experts on gravity, space, and virtual reality.

episodes.name: Go-Kart
episodes.overview: Tyler takes his love of speed, cars, and racing to try and create his ultimate electric go-kart.

episodes.name: Furniture
episodes.overview: Tyler's been dreaming of a new bed since 2013, and he finally gets his wish when he designs one fitted to match his imagination.
